review: This product has seriously exceeded my expectations. After reading online and seeing many people write negative feedback about this product, I was hesitant to purchase it. I am sure glad that I took the gamble. This product was a cinch to get hooked up with our WiFi router (D-link DIR-655). It has since turned my 6 year old Vista 47inch LCD flat panel TV into a smart TV. I couldn't be any more satisfied with this tiny toggle. I plan on purchasing a second Chromecast in the near future!

author: H_Huck "Huck"

review: The Google Chromecast definitely has a target audience. I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend since she does not have a SMART TV and was stuck watching Netflix and YouTube on her phone. The setup for the Chromecast was idiotproof in my experience and I had absolutely zero issues with it then (and continue to have zero issues). It definitely has a target audience of those without SMART TV's but can still be useful to those who do have SMART TV's as you can control the streaming from your phone, and even stream a few more things to it than your SMART TV probably has apps for. Everyday use is far too easy to have any complaints about and even controlling it from multiple different devices (for example, adding YouTube videos to the queue) is not difficult at all. The best part, however, would be the ease of connecting your devices to it since, well, you don't have to! If your device is on the same Wi-Fi network as the Chromecast, it will automatically add in the "cast" button in to the supported apps. All in all, a great product that I would buy again if need ever arose.
